verses.verse: וַתְּהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> become צַעֲקַ֥ת <S%H6818><s%> cry הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <S%H802><s%> and of their wives גְּדוֹלָ֑ה <S%H1419><s%> And there was a great אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against אֲחֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H251><s%> against their brethren הַיְּהוּדִֽים׃ <S%H3064><s%> the Jews

וְיֵשׁ֙ <S%H3426><s%> For there were אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who אֹמְרִ֔ים <S%H559><s%> that said בָּנֵ֥ינוּ <S%H1121><s%> We our sons וּבְנֹתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H1323><s%> and our daughters אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> [are] many וְנִקְחָ֥ה <S%H3947><s%> therefore we take up דָגָ֖ן <S%H1715><s%> corn וְנֹאכְלָ֥ה <S%H398><s%> [for them] that we may eat וְנִחְיֶֽה׃ <S%H2421><s%> and live

וְיֵשׁ֙ <S%H3426><s%> [Some] also there were אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who אֹמְרִ֔ים <S%H559><s%> that said שְׂדֹתֵ֛ינוּ <S%H7704><s%> our lands וּכְרָמֵ֥ינוּ <S%H3754><s%> vineyards וּבָתֵּ֖ינוּ <S%H1004><s%> and houses אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we עֹרְבִ֑ים <S%H6148><s%> We have mortgaged וְנִקְחָ֥ה <S%H3947><s%> that we might buy דָגָ֖ן <S%H1715><s%> corn בָּרָעָֽב׃ <S%H7458><s%> because of the dearth

וְיֵשׁ֙ <S%H3426><s%> There were אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who אֹמְרִ֔ים <S%H559><s%> also that said לָוִ֥ינוּ <S%H3867><s%> We have borrowed כֶ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> money לְמִדַּ֣ת <S%H4060><s%> tribute הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> for the king's שְׂדֹתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H7704><s%> [and that upon] our lands וּכְרָמֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H3754><s%> and vineyards

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now כִּבְשַׂ֤ר <S%H1320><s%> Yet now our flesh אַחֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H251><s%> of our brethren בְּשָׂרֵ֔נוּ <S%H1320><s%> [is] as the flesh כִּבְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1121><s%> our children בָּנֵ֑ינוּ <S%H1121><s%> as their children וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> behold אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we כֹ֠בְשִׁים <S%H3533><s%> and lo we bring into bondage אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנֵ֨ינוּ <S%H1121><s%> our sons וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֹתֵ֜ינוּ <S%H1323><s%> and our daughters לַעֲבָדִ֗ים <S%H5650><s%> to be servants וְיֵ֨שׁ <S%H3426><s%> are מִבְּנֹתֵ֤ינוּ <S%H1323><s%> and [some] of our daughters נִכְבָּשׁוֹת֙ <S%H3533><s%> brought unto bondage וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> else לְאֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> God יָדֵ֔נוּ <S%H3027><s%> because וּשְׂדֹתֵ֥ינוּ <S%H7704><s%> have our lands וּכְרָמֵ֖ינוּ <S%H3754><s%> and vineyards לַאֲחֵרִֽים׃ <S%H312><s%> [to redeem them] for other men

וַיִּ֥חַר <S%H2734><s%> angry לִ֖י מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> And I was very כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> I שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ <S%H8085><s%> when I heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זַֽעֲקָתָ֔ם <S%H2201><s%> their cry וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <S%H1697><s%> and these words הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> and these

וַיִּמָּלֵ֨ךְ <S%H4427><s%> Then I consulted לִבִּ֜י <S%H3820><s%> with myself עָלַ֗י <S%H5921><s%> against וָאָרִ֙יבָה֙ <S%H7378><s%> and I rebuked אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֹרִ֣ים <S%H2715><s%> the nobles וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַסְּגָנִ֔ים <S%H5461><s%> and the rulers וָאֹמְרָ֣ה <S%H559><s%> and said לָהֶ֔ם מַשָּׁ֥א <S%H5378><s%> debt אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> every one בְּאָחִ֖יו <S%H251><s%> of his brother אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you נֹשִׁ֑אים <S%H5383><s%> creditor וָאֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> And I set עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> against קְהִלָּ֥ה <S%H6952><s%> assembly גְדוֹלָֽה׃ <S%H1419><s%> a great

וָאֹמְרָ֣ה <S%H559><s%> And I said לָהֶ֗ם אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we קָ֠נִינוּ <S%H7069><s%> have redeemed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַחֵ֨ינוּ <S%H251><s%> our brethren הַיְּהוּדִ֜ים <S%H3064><s%> the Jews הַנִּמְכָּרִ֤ים <S%H4376><s%> which were sold לַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> unto the heathen כְּדֵ֣י <S%H1767><s%> unto them We after our ability בָ֔נוּ וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> even אַתֶּ֛ם <S%H859><s%> you תִּמְכְּר֥וּ <S%H4376><s%> and will ye even sell אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H251><s%> your brothers וְנִמְכְּרוּ־ <S%H4376><s%> may be sold לָ֑נוּ וַֽיַּחֲרִ֔ישׁוּ <S%H2790><s%> unto us? Then held they their peace וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not מָצְא֖וּ <S%H4672><s%> and found דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> answer ס

[וַיֹּאמֶר כ] (וָאֹומַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> answer ק) לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> It [is] not good הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> that אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you עֹשִׂ֑ים <S%H6213><s%> ye do הֲל֞וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not בְּיִרְאַ֤ת <S%H3374><s%> in the fear אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H430><s%> of our God תֵּלֵ֔כוּ <S%H1980><s%> walk מֵחֶרְפַּ֖ת <S%H2781><s%> because of the reproach הַגּוֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen אוֹיְבֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H341><s%> our enemies

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> and likewise אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I אַחַ֣י <S%H251><s%> I likewise [and] my brethren וּנְעָרַ֔י <S%H5288><s%> and my servants נֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H5383><s%> might exact בָּהֶ֖ם כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of them money וְדָגָ֑ן <S%H1715><s%> and corn נַֽעַזְבָה־ <S%H5800><s%> I pray you let us leave off נָּ֖א <S%H4994><s%> Please אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּשָּׁ֥א <S%H4855><s%> this usury הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

הָשִׁיבוּ֩ <S%H7725><s%> Restore נָ֨א <S%H4994><s%> Please לָהֶ֜ם כְּהַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> I pray you to them even this day שְׂדֹתֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H7704><s%> their lands כַּרְמֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H3754><s%> their vineyards זֵיתֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H2132><s%> their oliveyards וּבָתֵּיהֶ֑ם <S%H1004><s%> and their houses וּמְאַ֨ת <S%H3967><s%> also the hundredth הַכֶּ֤סֶף <S%H3701><s%> [part] of the money וְהַדָּגָן֙ <S%H1715><s%> and of the corn הַתִּיר֣וֹשׁ <S%H8492><s%> the wine וְהַיִּצְהָ֔ר <S%H3323><s%> and the oil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after אַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> you נֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H5383><s%> that ye exact בָּהֶֽם׃

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> Then said נָשִׁ֗יב <S%H7725><s%> they We will restore וּמֵהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> like לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nothing נְבַקֵּ֔שׁ <S%H1245><s%> [them] and will require כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> exactly נַעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> nothing of them so will we do כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you אוֹמֵ֑ר <S%H559><s%> as thou sayest וָאֶקְרָא֙ <S%H7121><s%> Then I called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests וָֽאַשְׁבִּיעֵ֔ם <S%H7650><s%> and took an oath לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> of them that they should do כַּדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> according to this promise הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also חָצְנִ֣י <S%H2684><s%> my lap נָעַ֗רְתִּי <S%H5287><s%> Also I shook וָֽאֹמְרָ֡ה <S%H559><s%> and said כָּ֣כָה <S%H3602><s%> Thus יְנַעֵ֪ר <S%H5287><s%> shake out הָֽאֱלֹהִ֟ים <S%H430><s%> So God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every הָאִישׁ֩ <S%H376><s%> every man אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יָקִ֜ים <S%H6965><s%> that performeth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> not this promise הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> this מִבֵּיתוֹ֙ <S%H1004><s%> from his house וּמִ֣יגִיע֔וֹ <S%H3018><s%> and from his labour וְכָ֛כָה <S%H3602><s%> thus יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become נָע֖וּר <S%H5287><s%> even thus be he shaken out וָרֵ֑ק <S%H7386><s%> and emptied וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <S%H559><s%> said כָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַקָּהָ֜ל <S%H6951><s%> And all the congregation אָמֵ֗ן <S%H543><s%> Amen וַֽיְהַלְלוּ֙ <S%H1984><s%> and praised אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> And the people כַּדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> according to this promise הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

גַּ֞ם <S%H1571><s%> Moreover מִיּ֣וֹם ׀ <S%H3117><s%> Moreover from the time אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> i צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> that I was appointed אֹתִ֗י <S%H853><s%> לִהְי֣וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become פֶּחָם֮ <S%H6346><s%> to be their governor בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land יְהוּדָה֒ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah מִשְּׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> year עֶשְׂרִ֗ים <S%H6242><s%> from the twentieth וְ֠עַד <S%H5704><s%> against שְׁנַ֨ת <S%H8141><s%> year שְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirtieth וּשְׁתַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H8147><s%> even unto the two לְאַרְתַּחְשַׁ֣סְתְּא <S%H783><s%> of Artaxerxes הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king שָׁנִ֖ים <S%H8141><s%> years שְׁתֵּ֣ים <S%H8147><s%> both עֶשְׂרֵ֑ה <S%H6240><s%> ten אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> my וְאַחַ֔י <S%H251><s%> I and my brethren לֶ֥חֶם <S%H3899><s%> the bread הַפֶּ֖חָה <S%H6346><s%> of the governor לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> neither אָכַֽלְתִּי׃ <S%H398><s%> have not eaten

וְהַפַּחוֹת֩ <S%H6346><s%> governors הָרִאשֹׁנִ֨ים <S%H7223><s%> But the former אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who לְפָנַ֜י <S%H6440><s%> that [had been] before הִכְבִּ֣ידוּ <S%H3513><s%> me were chargeable עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> unto the people וַיִּקְח֨וּ <S%H3947><s%> and had taken מֵהֶ֜ם <S%H1992><s%> them בְּלֶ֤חֶם <S%H3899><s%> of them bread וָיַ֙יִן֙ <S%H3196><s%> and wine אַחַר֙ <S%H310><s%> beside כֶּֽסֶף־ <S%H3701><s%> of silver שְׁקָלִ֣ים <S%H8255><s%> shekels אַרְבָּעִ֔ים <S%H705><s%> forty גַּ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> yea even נַעֲרֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5288><s%> their servants שָׁלְט֣וּ <S%H7980><s%> bare rule עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> over the people וַאֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not עָשִׂ֣יתִי <S%H6213><s%> but so did כֵ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> so מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> not I because יִרְאַ֥ת <S%H3374><s%> of the fear אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

וְ֠גַם <S%H1571><s%> also בִּמְלֶ֜אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> in the work הַחוֹמָ֤ה <S%H2346><s%> of this wall הַזֹּאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> likewise הֶחֱזַ֔קְתִּי <S%H2388><s%> Yea also I continued וְשָׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> we any land לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not קָנִ֑ינוּ <S%H7069><s%> neither bought וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all נְעָרַ֔י <S%H5288><s%> and all my servants קְבוּצִ֥ים <S%H6908><s%> [were] gathered שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for הַמְּלָאכָֽה׃ <S%H4399><s%> thither unto the work
